headline: How The Mid-America Apartment Communities (MAA) Story Is Shifting As Analyst Views Rebalance
summary: The latest update to the analyst model for Mid-America Apartment Communities trims the fair value estimate slightly from US$146.96 to US$145.92, a small adjustment that still reflects a detailed reassessment of the company’s outlook. That move comes as research firms cluster updated targets in roughly the mid to upper US$130s to US$160 range, balancing optimism around apartment fundamentals with ongoing caution across real estate investment trusts. As you read on, you will see how these...

headline: MAA Announces Pricing of Senior Unsecured Notes Offering
summary: Mid-America Apartment Communities, Inc., ("MAA") (NYSE: MAA) today announced that its operating partnership, Mid-America Apartments, L.P. ("MAALP"), priced a $200,000,000 offering of MAALP's 4.650% senior unsecured notes due January 15, 2033 (the "Notes") under its existing shelf registration statement. The Notes are being offered as additional notes under a tenth supplemental indenture pursuant to which MAALP previously issued $400,000,000 aggregate principal amount of 4.650% senior notes due 2

content.title: MAA Announces Pricing of Senior Unsecured Notes Offering
content.summary: Mid-America Apartment Communities, Inc., ("MAA") (NYSE: MAA) today announced that its operating partnership, Mid-America Apartments, L.P. ("MAALP"), priced a $200,000,000 offering of MAALP's 4.650% senior unsecured notes due January 15, 2033 (the "Notes") under its existing shelf registration statement. The Notes are being offered as additional notes under a tenth supplemental indenture pursuant to which MAALP previously issued $400,000,000 aggregate principal amount of 4.650% senior notes due 2
